description: Full of succulent prawns and fresh snow peas, and made in three easy steps, this yellow curry recipe is the perfect midweek dinner.
name: Yellow Prawn Curry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add tomato and three-quarters of the coconut. Cook for 2 minutes or until tomato starts to soften. Add prawns and snow peas, then cook for a further 2 minutes or until prawns are just cooked through. Add lime juice and stir to combine. Top curry with remaining coconut, and serve with rice and extra lime wedges.

Add lime juice and stir to combine. Top curry with remaining coconut, and serve with rice and extra lime wedges.
